content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position y1)

### Iron plate crafting area at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft items without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need sufficient iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
